nyuk, nyuk, nyuk…
Welcome to Kato's room.

That doesn't really matter
all that much, babushika.{PAUSE}Get ready, caped crusader, Nya-ha, ha……
Don't think you'll get away so easy.

Now on to a fascinating new world…
Let's go!!
You won't regret it.

Hello there, wanna be-hero.
You ready for your journey?

How about it? Have you made up your mind?
Mind boggling adventures await
you.

To Mideel!

To Mideel, right?
Okay!
Then, let's go.
Hang in there!

Sorry.
I'm still not ready.

But I'll be up and ready to go in a minute.
Wait just a minute!

Silly…
Didn't anyone tell you?
This IS Hades.

Who're you going with?
I'm starting over
